How groome help Hiring

Maximise lead to conversion ratio

Uncover insights, know your priority

Combining the power of next generation data science tools and path breaking business recruitment insights, Groome is a hyperscale game changer for all levels of recruitment ecosystems.

Track and follow-up on every deal

Smart command and control center lets you give undivided attention on a broader portfolio of projects, clients and vendors for a streamlined service offering that is cost sensitive and talent supportive.

Set, manage and achieve your targets

Move ahead with agility. Empower your enterprise to measure the talent deficit gap and make positive changes instantly without waiting for days to find a solution.

Collaborate in real time

Manage workflows, have relevant conversations

Wasting productive hours is now a thing of the past. Make every talk become meaningful and important as you communicate with customers and peers to generate instant lead on the right candidate.

Schedule meetings, get smarter in your follow up

Stay ahead of the game by ticking all the boxes in the candidate check list in every interaction. Knowledge, skills, aptitude, value to the organisation, ability to deliver the desired results are all at your finger tips to make well calibrated decisions.

Organize your appointments, tasks, notes & files

With a fully integrated, automated and comprehensive talent management system, candidate database is carefully indexed and sorted for quick recall. It is truly all under one roof.

Run customer centric business

Gain intelligence on your customer sentiments

Appreciate and understand industry trends and job market behaviour to position yourself actively and profitably. Make an informed choice taking all variables into consideration to assess the right fit.

Cherry pick leads, make deals

Attract the right agile talent from a highly filtered selection pool. Go beyond pilot projects in the recruitment space as you switch to next generation ATS and CMS powerhouse suite to transform your business.

Capture your customer needs in a single view

See and react to talent queries with full kinetic energy. Intelligent dashboard that is easily accessible across devices make candidate profiling and project monitoring a successful endeavour.

Talent workbench

Paperless onboarding

With intelligent mapping and single point documentation destination framework embedded in the core of Groome, sustainable and environmentally conscious recruiting is the way forward. See massive savings on stationery and a clutter free desk as you stay more organised.

Employee data governance

Incorporating good governance policies to manage employee data will pave way for smoother compliance and regulation while ensuring accountability and trust are embedded at the core of operations for clients and customers.

Project resource mapping

Take the next big leap in the recruitment landscape as you bring everybody together. Quit working in silos across multiple channels and teams as you achieve complete in-house integration in your staffing solutions.

Talent Supply Chain

Shared economy on talent pool

Invest smarter and stay clear of loss making strategies. Approach employee transition with confidence and maturity as you gain mastery over retention and attrition data.

Reduce cost & time to hire

Smoothen the talent acquisition cycle for a seamless integration. No matter the stage, no matter the source, know where your applications are and what’s next for them.

Meet your hiring targets

Never miss a deadline. Schedule all your projects and bench resources in a smart queue and flag them for quick completion. With advanced talent management tools and 360º feedback systems, staying on course and sailing smooth becomes the basic norm.

Talent pool management

Easy resource planning & utilization

Polish your team to scale new heights, every day. Create innovative work environment and strong incentives for everybody to grow in the organization.

visibility to resource pipeline

Hire only the right mix of the best and the brightest candidates with tailor made search using advanced match selection solutions. Pinpoint with precision as you make a sound decision taking all possibilities into consideration to retain or to explore further.

leverage talent mining

You don’t choose a high performance team. You build them from scratch and see them scale and evolve over time. With Groome, you can achieve that 10X faster than any other traditional way of finding the right talent.

Accelerated sourcing

Single system of reference

With an advanced search engine capabilities and single file condensation collation techniques, you are kept in complete loop from start to finish without looking at several files. Available for a comprehensive review at the click of a button, navigating and maneuvering candidates across benches is a breeze.

Talent replenishment

Scale up your firm visibility and sustain brand credibility. Develop an organic organizational culture that is resistant to stress. See your human engagement become stronger and bolder in every job market transaction.

Search start, rank & share

Geared to serve as the talent architect of millennial workforce, Groome scans the entire work ecosystem to predict and understand industry needs and deliver the output rapidly. Rank each profile using novel. Metrics and move the profile around across teams to close on a new opening or to keep it in the reserve pool for better lead generation.

Intelligent recruiting

Automated workflows

Harness valuable insights from key cases, multi client requirements and targeted role alerts to bolster recruitment for higher engagements, resulting in responsive workflows that are data driven and fully automated.

Free up your team from mundane

Do more in less time. Predictive analytics and high level overview of candidate performance assessment platforms make people management so much easier and efficient.

Take data driven decisions

Bid goodbye to intuition, hearsay and may-be scenarios as you begin to take bold decisions with AI powered insights. With responsible data presented in stunning visuals, creating that rich board level report is now a reality without any form of delegation.

AI powered sourcing

Find the best talents, faster

Groome is the recruiters brain and brawn. Built from the ground up with powerful data mining tools, cognitive computing and specialist operational skills that when combined together provide real time inferencing to make faster and intelligent assessments.

Predict your next hire

See instant profile updates and upgrades, assess qualifications and internal performance trends and change the way you see hiring complexities. With masterful actionable insights prompted across all your devices and platforms, what you witness is a closer integration of process and systems. The final result is the unhindered freedom to make confident decisions, every time.

Increase your pipeline with high quality candidates

See a dynamic and diversified candidate pipeline in every JD request that you place. Make an intelligent choice from a comprehensive pool without losing sight of your organisational goals.
